metadata.title: CVE-2015-5228 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The service daemon in CRIU creates log and dump files insecurely, whichallows local users to create arbitrary files and take ownership of existingfiles via unspecified vectors related to a directory path.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5228` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

criu - 2.6-1ubuntu1~ubuntu16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: criu package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6-1ubuntu1~ubuntu16.04.2').
